name: Theo Sorel
data: It's freeing to be able to catch up on customized news and not be distracted by a social media element on the same site

name: Daniel Keystone
data: The simple and intuitive design makes it easy for me use. I highly recommend Fetch to my peers.

name: Shirley Fultz
data: I enjoy catching up with Fetch on my laptop, or on my phone when I'm on the go!
